Broken Deity.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Increase Luna's deploy range by {scale=20|20}%.

Crescent.card_desc: [Lunar Leap] Reset the Cooldown of Lunar Leap after dropping to or below {scale=15|15}% Health.

Eternal Reliquary.card_desc: [Rune of Travel] Increase the duration of Rune of Travel by {scale=1|1}s.

Full Moon.card_desc: [Lunar Leap] Gain a {scale=100|100}-Health Shield for 3s after activating Lunar Leap.

Goddess' Blessing.card_desc: [Moonlight] Allies being Healed by Moonlight take 25% reduced damage.

Half Moon.card_desc: [Lunar Leap] Reduce the Cooldown of Lunar Leap by {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Life Link.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] [Guardian Spirit] Luna Heals allies around her for 300 per second.

Lunar Connection.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Reduce the cooldown of Luna's initial deploy by {scale=1.2|1.2}s.

Moonlight Garden.card_desc: [Weapon] Generate {scale=2|2}% Moonlight for each enemy hit with Light Bow.

Moonwalk.card_desc: [Armor] Lower your gravity and increase your air control by {scale=50|10}% while using Moonlight.

Protectors.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Regenerate {scale=2|2}% Moonlight every 1s while within 30 units of Luna.

Restored Faith.card_desc: [Moonlight] Heal for {scale=10|10} every time you Heal an ally with Moonlight.

Sacrifice.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] [Guardian Spirit] If Io falls below 200 Health while Luna is active, she trades places with Luna, Heals for 50% of her Health, and Luna dies in her stead.

Sanctum of Faith.card_desc: [Moonlight] Regenerate {scale=1|1}% Moonlight every 1s while not using Moonlight.

Sky-Walker.card_desc: [Armor] Lower your gravity and increase your air control by {scale=50|10}% while firing your Light Bow.

Spirit Arrows.card_desc: [Moonlight] Reduce the Cooldown of Luna's redeploy by {scale=0.1|0.1}s.

Swift Arrows.card_desc: [Moonlight] Increase allies' Movement Speed by {scale=8|8}% while they are being Healed by Moonlight.

Animalische St\u00e4rke.card_desc: [Schutzgeist] Erhöht Lunas maximale Gesundheit um {scale=200|200} LP.

Besch\u00fctzer.card_desc: [Schutzgeist] Regeneriert pro Sekunde {scale=2|2}% Mondlicht, wenn du maximal 30 Einheiten von Luna entfernt bist.

Erneuerter Glaube.card_desc: [Mondlicht] Heilst du Verbündete mit Mondlicht, wirst du {scale=10|10} LP geheilt.

Ewigkeitsreliquiar.card_desc: [Rune der Reise] Erhöht die Dauer von Rune der Reise um {scale=1|1}s.

Flinke Pfeile.card_desc: [Mondlicht] Erhöht das Lauftempo von Verbündeten um {scale=8|8}%, während sie mit Mondlicht geheilt werden.

Geisterpfeile.card_desc: [Mondlicht] Reduziert die Abklingzeit für Lunas erneuten Einsatz um {scale=0.1|0.1}s.

Glaubensheiligtum.card_desc: [Mondlicht] Regeneriert pro Sekunde {scale=1|1}% Mondlicht, solange Mondlicht nicht aktiv ist.

Halbmond.card_desc: [Mondsprung] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Mondsprung um {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Himmelsgestirn.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=50|50} LP.

Himmelsl\u00e4ufer.card_desc: [Rüstung] Reduziert die Erdanziehung und erhöht die Luftkontrolle um {scale=50|10}%, während du deinen Lichtbogen abfeuerst.

Lebensbund.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] [Schutzgeist] Luna heilt nahe Verbündete nun 300 LP pro Sekunde.

Lunare Verbindung.card_desc: [Schutzgeist] Reduziert die für Lunas Ersteinsatz benötigte Zeit um {scale=1.2|1.2}s.

Mondlichtgarten.card_desc: [Waffe] Treffer mit dem Lichtbogen erzeugen {scale=2|2}% Mondlicht.

Mondsichel.card_desc: [Mondsprung] Fällst du auf oder unter {scale=15|15}% deiner maximalen Gesundheit, wird die Abklingzeit von Mondsprung zurückgesetzt.

Mondspaziergang.card_desc: [Rüstung] Reduziert die Erdanziehung und erhöht die Luftkontrolle während der Verwendung von Mondlicht um {scale=50|10}%.

Opfergabe.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] [Schutzgeist] Fällt deine Gesundheit auf oder unter 200 LP, während Luna aktiv ist, tauscht ihr die Position und du wirst um 50% von Lunas Gesundheit geheilt, während Luna an deiner Stelle stirbt.

Segen der G\u00f6ttin.card_desc: [Mondlicht] Verbündete erleiden 25% weniger Schaden, während sie von Mondlicht geheilt werden.

Vollmond.card_desc: [Mondsprung] Nach Aktivierung von Mondsprung erhältst du 3s lang einen Schild mit {scale=100|100} LP.

B\u00e9n\u00e9diction de la d\u00e9esse.card_desc: [Clair de lune] Les alliés soignés par Clair de lune subissent 25% de dégâts en moins.

Connexion lunaire.card_desc: [Gardien spirituel] L'invocation de Luna se recharge {scale=1.2|1.2}s plus vite.

Courroux f\u00e9roce.card_desc: [Gardien spirituel] Luna a {scale=200|200} PV de plus.

Croissant.card_desc: [Saut sélène] Passer en dessous de {scale=15|15}% de PV réinitialise le temps de recharge de Saut sélène.

D\u00e9esse d\u00e9chue.card_desc: [Gardien spirituel] La portée d'invocation de Luna augmente de {scale=20|20}%.

Demi-lune.card_desc: [Saut sélène] Saut sélène se recharge {scale=0.6|0.6}s plus vite.

Fl\u00e8ches spirituelles.card_desc: [Clair de lune] L’invocation de Luna se recharge {scale=0.1|0.1}s plus vite.

Fl\u00e8ches v\u00e9loces.card_desc: [Clair de lune] Clair de lune augmente de {scale=8|8}% la vitesse des alliés soignés.

Jardin lunaire.card_desc: [Arme] Les tirs réussis redonnent {scale=2|2}% de Clair de lune.

Lien vital.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] [Gardien spirituel] Luna rend 300 PV par seconde aux alliés proches.

Marcher sur la lune.card_desc: [Armure] Clair de lune diminue votre gravité de {scale=50|10}% et augmente votre contrôle aérien d'autant.

Pleine lune.card_desc: [Saut sélène] Saut sélène donne un bouclier de {scale=100|100} PV pendant 3s.

Promenade stellaire.card_desc: [Armure] Utiliser l'Arc de lumière diminue votre gravité de {scale=50|10}% et augmente votre contrôle aérien d'autant.

Protecteurs.card_desc: [Gardien spirituel] À moins de 30 unités de vous, Luna redonne {scale=2|2}% de Clair de lune par seconde.

Reliquaire \u00e9ternel.card_desc: [Rune de mobilité] La Rune de mobilité dure {scale=1|1}s de plus.

Restauration de foi.card_desc: [Clair de lune] Vous regagnez {scale=10|10} PV à chaque fois qu'un allié est soigné par Clair de lune.

Sacrifice.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] [Gardien spirituel] Passer en dessous de 200 PV alors que Luna est active vous soigne et vous fait changer de place avec elle, puis elle meurt.

Sanctuaire sacr\u00e9.card_desc: [Clair de lune] Vous regagnez {scale=1|1}% de Clair de lune chaque seconde tant que vous ne l'utilisez pas.

IoCardArmor3.card_desc: [Armor] Lower your gravity by {scale=5|5}% while firing your Light Bow.

IoCardArmor4.card_desc: [Armor] NOT FUNCTIONAL YET - Hits with Light Bow restore {1|1}% Moonlight.

IoCardF2.card_desc: [Lunar Leap] Increase the strength of your F by {scale=5|5}%.

IoCardF3.card_desc: [Lunar Leap] Gain a {scale=100|100} shield when you use F.

IoCardQ1.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] NOT FUNCTIONAL YET - Reduce the cooldown of Rush (12s) by {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

IoCardQ2.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Increase your Spirits deploy range by {scale=10|10}%.

IoCardQ3.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] NOT FUNCTIONAL YET - Your Guardian Fox restores {scale=1|1}% Moonlight every 1s.

IoCardQ4.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] NOT FUNCTIONAL YET - Reduce the cooldown of your Guardian Spirit deploy and redeploy by {scale=8|8}%.

IoCardRMB1.card_desc: [Moonlight] NOT FUNCTIONAL YET - Generate {scale=1|1}% Moonlight every 2s.

IoCardRMB2.card_desc: [Moonlight] Successful hits heal Io for {scale=20|20} health.

IoCardRMB3.card_desc: [Moonlight] Successful hits reduce the cooldown of Guardian Spirit by {0.1|0.1}s.

IoCardRMB4.card_desc: [Moonlight] Allies gain {scale=3|3}% Movement Speed for 3s after being healed by RMB.

Bendici\u00f3n de la diosa.card_desc: [Luz de luna] Se reduce el daño recibido por los aliados curados por Luz de luna un 25%.

Caminante del cielo.card_desc: [Armadura] Reduce tu gravedad y aumenta tu control en el aire un {scale=50|10}% mientras disparas tu Arco de luz.

Conexi\u00f3n lunar.card_desc: [Espíritu guardián] Se reduce la recarga del despliegue inicial de Luna en {scale=1.2|1.2}s.

Creciente.card_desc: [Salto lunar] Se reduce la recarga de Salto lunar cuando tu salud baja al {scale=15|15}% o menos.

Cuerpo celestial.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu salud máxima aumenta en {scale=50|50} PS.

Deidad rota.card_desc: [Espíritu guardián] El alcance de despliegue de Luna aumenta un {scale=20|20}%.

Fe restaurada.card_desc: [Luz de luna] Te curas {scale=10|10} PS cada vez que curas a un aliado con Luz de luna.

Flechas espirituales.card_desc: [Luz de luna] Se reduce la recarga del despliegue de Luna en {scale=0.1|0.1}s.

Flechas veloces.card_desc: [Luz de luna] La velocidad de movimiento de los aliados aumenta un {scale=8|8}% mientras son curados por Luz de luna.

Fuerza salvaje.card_desc: [Espíritu guardián] La salud de Luna aumenta en  {scale=200|200} PS.

Jard\u00edn de luz de luna.card_desc: [Arma] Luz de luna se recarga un {scale=2|2}% con cada enemigo alcanzado.

Luna llena.card_desc: [Salto lunar] Obtienes un escudo de {scale=100|100} PS durante 3s tras activar Salto lunar.

Media luna.card_desc: [Salto lunar] Se reduce la recarga de Salto lunar en {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Paso lunar.card_desc: [Armadura] Reduce tu gravedad y aumenta tu control en el aire un {scale=50|10}% al usar Luz de luna.

Protectores.card_desc: [Espíritu guardián] Luz de luna se recarga un {scale=2|2}% cada 1s mientras estés a 30 unidades o menos de Luna.

Relicario eterno.card_desc: [Runa viajera] La duración de la Runa viajera aumenta en {scale=1|1}s.

Sacrificio.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] [Espíritu guardián] Si la salud de Io baja de 200 PS con Luna activada, Io intercambiará su posición con Luna, se curará un 50% de su salud y Luna morirá en su lugar.

Santuario de fe.card_desc: [Luz de luna] Luz de luna se regenera un {scale=1|1}% a cada segundo que no uses dicha habilidad.

V\u00ednculo vital.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] [Espíritu guardián] Luna cura ahora a los aliados a su alrededor 300 PS por segundo.

Andarilha do C\u00e9u.card_desc: [Armadura] Diminui sua gravidade e aumenta seu controle aéreo em {scale=50|10}% enquanto está disparando o Arco de Luz.

B\u00ean\u00e7\u00e3o da Deusa.card_desc: [Luz da Lua] Aliados que estão sendo curados pela Luz da Lua tomam 25% menos dano.

Caminhante da Lua.card_desc: [Armadura] Diminui sua gravidade e aumenta seu controle aéreo em {scale=50|10}% enquanto usa a Luz da Lua.

Conex\u00e3o Lunar.card_desc: [Espírito Guardião] Reduz o intervalo da colocação inicial de Luna em {scale=1.2|1.2}s.

Corpo Celestial.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta a sua vida máxima em {scale=50|50}.

Divindade Quebrada.card_desc: [Espírito Guardião] O alcance no qual Luna pode ser colocada aumenta em {scale=20|20}%.

Elo da Vida.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] [Espírito Guardião] Luna agora cura os aliados em volta em 300 de vida por segundo.

F\u00e9 Restaurada.card_desc: [Luz da Lua] Você se cura em {scale=10|10} de vida cada vez que você cura um aliado com Luz da Lua.

Flecha Espiritual.card_desc: [Luz da Lua] Reduz em {scale=0.1|0.1}s o intervalo necessário para recolocar Luna.

Flechas Velocistas.card_desc: [Luz da Lua] Aumenta em {scale=8|8}% a velocidade de movimento por 3s dos aliados curados pela Luz da Lua.

For\u00e7a Feral.card_desc: [Espírito Guardião] Aumenta a vida de Luna em {scale=200|200}.

Jardim da Lua.card_desc: [Arma] Gera {scale=2|2}% de Luz da Lua para cada inimigo atingido pelo Arco de Luz.

Lua Cheia.card_desc: [Salto Lunar] Ganha um escudo com {scale=100|100} de vida por 3s após ativar o Salto Lunar.

Lua Crescente.card_desc: [Salto Lunar] Zera o intervalo do Salto Lunar ao chegar a {scale=15|15}% ou menos de vida.

Meia Lua.card_desc: [Salto Lunar] Reduz o intervalo do Salto Lunar em {scale=0.6|0.6}s.

Protetores.card_desc: [Espírito Guardião] Regenera {scale=2|2}% de Luz da Lua a cada 1s enquanto estiver a 30 unidades de distância de Luna.

Relic\u00e1rio Eterno.card_desc: [Runa de Transporte] Aumenta em {scale=1|1}s a duração da Runa de Transporte.

Sacrif\u00edcio.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] [Espírito Guardião] Se Io chegar abaixo de 200 de vida quando Luna estiver ativa, ela troca de lugar com Luna e se cura com 50% de vida, e Luna morre em seu lugar.

Santu\u00e1rio da F\u00e9.card_desc: [Luz da Lua] Regenera {scale=1|1}% de Luz da Lua a cada 1s enquanto ela não está sendo usada.

\u0411\u043b\u0430\u0433\u043e\u0441\u04.card_desc: [Лунный свет] Союзники получают на 25% меньше урона во время исцеления Лунным светом.

\u0411\u044b\u0441\u0442\u0440\u044b\u04.card_desc: [Лунный свет] Скорость союзников во время исцеления Лунным светом повышается на {scale=8|8}% .

\u0416\u0435\u0440\u0442\u0432\u0430.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] [Дух-хранитель] Если здоровье Ио падает ниже 200 ед., пока активна Луна, она меняется местами с лисой, исцеляясь на 50% от ее здоровья, а лиса умирает вместо нее.

\u0417\u0430\u0449\u0438\u0442\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Дух-хранитель] Лунный свет каждую секунду заряжается на {scale=2|2}% в радиусе 30 ед. от Луны.

\u0418\u0434\u0443\u0449\u0430\u044f \u0.card_desc: [Броня] Сила гравитации уменьшается на {scale=50|10}% во время стрельбы из Светового лука.

\u041b\u0443\u043d\u043d\u0430\u044f \u0.card_desc: [Броня] Пока действует Лунный свет, управление в воздухе улучшается на {scale=50|10}%.
[Дух-хранитель] Перезарядка первого призыва Луны сокращается на {scale=1.2|1.2} с.

\u041b\u0443\u043d\u043d\u044b\u0439 \u0.card_desc: [Оружие] Каждое попадание по врагу из Светового лука заряжает Лунный свет на {scale=2|2}%.

\u041c\u0435\u0441\u044f\u0446.card_desc: [Лунный прыжок] При уровне здоровья {scale=15|15}% и ниже Лунный прыжок перезаряжается.

\u041d\u0435\u0431\u0435\u0441\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Ваше максимальное здоровье повышается на {scale=50|50} ед.

\u041e\u0431\u0440\u0435\u0442\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Лунный свет] Каждое исцеление союзника Лунным светом восстанавливает вам {scale=10|10} ед. здоровья.

\u041f\u0435\u0440\u0432\u043e\u0431\u04.card_desc: [Дух-хранитель] Запас здоровья Луны повышается на {scale=200|200} ед.

\u041f\u043e\u043b\u043d\u043e\u043b\u04.card_desc: [Лунный прыжок] После активации Лунного прыжка вы получаете щит прочностью {scale=100|100} ед. на 3 с.

\u041f\u043e\u043b\u0443\u043c\u0435\u04.card_desc: [Лунный прыжок] Перезарядка Лунного прыжка сокращается на {scale=0.6|0.6} с.

\u0420\u0435\u043b\u0438\u043a\u0432\u04.card_desc: [Руна путешествий] Длительность Руны путешествий повышается на {scale=1|1} с.

\u0421\u0432\u044f\u0437\u0430\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] [Дух-хранитель] Луна исцеляет союзников вокруг себя на 300 ед. в секунду.

\u0421\u0432\u044f\u0442\u0438\u043b\u04.card_desc: [Лунный свет] Лунный свет восстанавливается на {scale=1|1}% в секунду, когда не используется.

\u0421\u0442\u0440\u0435\u043b\u044b \u0.card_desc: [Лунный свет] Исцеление Лунным светом сокращает перезарядку Духа-хранителя на {scale=0.1|0.1} с.

B\u0142ogos\u0142awie\u0144stwo bogini.card_desc: [Światło Księżyca] Sojusznicy leczeni Światłem Księżyca otrzymują o 25% mniej obrażeń.

Chy\u017ce strza\u0142y.card_desc: [Światło Księżyca] Zwiększa o {scale=8|8}% szybkość ruchu sojuszników, kiedy są leczeni Światłem Księżyca.

Cia\u0142o niebieskie.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa twoje maks. zdrowie o {scale=50|50} PZ.

Dzika si\u0142a.card_desc: [Duch opiekuńczy] Zwiększa zdrowie Luny o {scale=200|200} PZ.

Ksi\u0119\u017cycowe po\u0142\u0105czeni.card_desc: [Duch opiekuńczy] Skraca czas odnowienia pierwszego przywołania Luny o {scale=1.2|1.2} s.

Ksi\u0119\u017cycowy ch\u00f3d.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zmniejsza twoje opadanie oraz zwiększa kontrolę lotu o {scale=50|10}% podczas korzystania ze Światła Księżyca.

Ksi\u0119\u017cycowy ogr\u00f3d.card_desc: [Broń] Każde trafienie wroga Łukiem światła wytwarza {scale=2|2}% Światła Księżyca.

Niebia\u0144ski piechur.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zmniejsza twoje opadanie o {scale=50|10}% i zwiększa kontrolę nad lotem podczas strzelania z Łuku

Obro\u0144cy.card_desc: [Duch opiekuńczy] Przywraca {scale=2|2}% Światła Księżyca co 1 s, jak długo jesteś w promieniu 30 jedn. od Luny.

Ogniwo \u017cycia.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] [Duch opiekuńczy] Luna przywraca okolicznym sojusznikom 300 PZ na sekundę.

Pe\u0142nia.card_desc: [Księżycowy skok] Zapewnia tarczę o odporności {scale=100|100} pkt. na 3 s po aktywacji Księżycowego skoku.

P\u00f3\u0142ksi\u0119\u017cyc.card_desc: [Księżycowy skok] Skraca czas odnowienia Księżycowego skoku o {scale=0.6|0.6} s.

Po\u015bwi\u0119cenie.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] [Duch opiekuńczy] Jeśli zdrowie Io spadnie poniżej 200 PZ, podczas gdy Luna jest aktywna, zamienia się z nią miejscami, odzyskuje 50% swojego zdrowia, a Luna umiera zamiast niej.

Przywr\u00f3cona wiara.card_desc: [Światło Księżyca] Przywraca ci {scale=10|10} PZ za każdym razem, kiedy leczysz sojusznika Światłem Księżyca.

Rozbita bosko\u015b\u0107.card_desc: [Duch opiekuńczy] Zwiększa zasięg przywołania Luny o {scale=20|20}%.

Sanktuarium wiary.card_desc: [Światło Księżyca] Przywraca {scale=1|1}% Światła Księżyca co 1 s, kiedy nie używasz Światła Księżyca.

Sierp Ksi\u0119\u017cyca.card_desc: [Księżycowy skok] Resetuje czas odnowienia Księżycowego skoku po tym, jak twoje zdrowie spadnie do poziomu {scale=15|15}% lub niżej.

Strza\u0142y duszy.card_desc: [Światło Księżyca] Skraca czas odnowienia przywołania Luny o {scale=0.1|0.1} s.

Wieczny relikwiarz.card_desc: [Runa podróży] Wydłuża czas trwania Runy podróży o {scale=1|1} s.

Ay Ba\u011flant\u0131s\u0131.card_desc: [Muhafız Ruh] Luna'nın ilk konuşlanmasının Bekleme Süresini {scale=1.2|1.2}sn azalt.

Ay I\u015f\u0131\u011f\u0131 Bah\u00e7es.card_desc: [Silah] Hafif Yay ile vurduğun her düşman için %{scale=2|2} Ay Işığı oluştur.

Ay Y\u00fcr\u00fcy\u00fc\u015f\u00fc.card_desc: [Zırh] Ay Işığı ile ateş ederken yer çekimini düşür ve hava kontrolünü %{scale=50|10} artır.

Dolunay.card_desc: [Ay Sıçrayışı] Ay Sıçrayışı'nı etkinleştirdikten sonra {scale=100|100} Canlık bir Kalkan kazan.

G\u00f6kte Gezen.card_desc: [Zırh] Hafif Yay ile ateş ederken yer çekimini düşür ve hava kontrolünü %{scale=50|10} artır.

Hayat Ba\u011flant\u0131s\u0131.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] [Muhafız Ruh] Luna, etrafındaki müttefikleri saniyede 300 Can İyileştirir.

Hilal.card_desc: [Ay Sıçrayışı] %{scale=15|15} Can veya altında iken Ay Sıçrayışı'nın Bekleme Süresini sıfırla.

\u0130nan\u00e7 \u0130adesi.card_desc: [Ay Işığı] Ay Işığı ile bir müttefiki her İyileştirdiğinde {scale=10|10} Can İyileş.

\u0130nan\u00e7 Merkezi.card_desc: [Ay Işığı] Ay Işığı kullanmazken her 1 saniyede %{scale=1|1} Ay Işığı doldur.

Koruyucular.card_desc: [Muhafız Ruh] Luna'nın 30 birim yakınında iken her 1 saniyede %{scale=2|2} Ay Işığı oluştur.

\u00d6zveri.card_desc: [Guardian Spirit] Luna etkinken Io 200 canın altına düşerse Luna ile yer değiştirir, Canının %50'si iyileşir ve Io yerine Luna ölür.

Ruh Oklar\u0131.card_desc: [Ay Işığı] Luna'nın yeniden konuşlanma Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.1|0.1}sn azalt.

Seri Oklar.card_desc: [Ay Işığı] Müttefikler, Ay Işığı ile iyileştirilirken %{scale=8|8} Hareket Hızı kazanır.

Tanr\u0131\u00e7an\u0131n Kutsamas\u0131.card_desc: [Ay Işığı] Ay Işığı ile İyileştirilen müttefikler %25 hasar azaltma kazanırlar.

Yar\u0131m Ay.card_desc: [Ay Sıçrayışı] Ay Sıçrayışı'nın Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.6|0.6}sn azalt.
